title: KLASS 30L Clear Plastic Storage Boxes With Lids Set of 4, Strong BPA Free Multipurpose Stackable Plastic Storage Box With Lid 30L Clear Containers For Home, Kitchen, Food, Garage, Office, Accessories
features: STRONG, DURABLE & BPA-FREE PLASTIC: Klass Home plastic storage boxes are proudly manufactured in Britain with premium quality polypropylene clear plastic. 100% BPA free and food safe, with no nasty smell. These clear storage boxes with lids & integrated handles provide ease of use, easier visibility & navigation

MULTI-PURPOSE STORAGE FOR HOME & OFFICE: These plastic boxes with lids storage provide all round multipurpose storage solution to declutter your life. These clear plastic storage boxes are suitable for multi-purpose plastic storage containers to declutter home, office or workplace.

SPACE SAVING, STACKABLE & NESTABLE: Save valuable floor space with these stacking storage boxes. They are incredibly strong and won't break when stacked. When not in use, you can easily nest them together to save space. Plus, the clear plastic containers and lids make finding your items a breeze

IDEAL SIZE & CAPACITY: Each plastic box measures 46 x 35.5 x 25cm, 30 litre capacity and weighs just 800g. These plastic storage boxes come in a set of 4, offering ample room for a variety of items ranging from food, toys, shoes, accessories, tools, makeup etc.

PEACE OF MIND: At Klass Home, we take pride in our customer support, exceeding expectations. As a British brand, we are committed to the highest quality standards, ensuring utmost customer satisfaction. Shop with confidence and enjoy peace of mind. Check out our brand's shopfront for a full range of storage solutions to declutter your space
description: Product Description Klass Home Collection 30L Clear Storage Boxes With Lids - Set Of 4 Transform your living and working spaces with the Klass Home Collection 30L Storage Boxes With Lids, a set of 4 clear plastic stackable storage boxes designed for efficient home and office organization. Our storage boxes plastic are proudly Made in Britain and crafted from premium polypropylene clear plastic, making them strong and safe. They are 100% BPA-free, ensuring that your stored items remain protected. Product Features Multi-purpose Storage Boxes For Every Day Needs These multipurpose plastic storage boxes with lids are your answer to decluttering in style. The plastic tubs adapt to various storage needs, whether you're tidying up your home or office or using them for loft storage, garage storage boxes etc. Each plastic box with lid boasts dimensions of 46 x 35.5 x 25cm, offering ample room for your belongings. With a set of 4 in every order, you'll have plenty of storage solutions at your fingertips, ideal for shoes, linen, furnishings, clothes, food, accessories, toys, and various bits & bobs. Large Variety of Sizes For All The Storage Needs Quality Stoarge Boxes For Everyday Use From KLASS Home Collection
